text:
A Moment of Reflection

A gloomy canal bank, a troubled man  
His thoughts spiral into despair.  
Man: “Why did I go to her?”  

Man: “I wanted her tears, her fear.”  

---  

A bridge looms ahead, memories swirl.  
Anxiety grips him tightly.  
Man: “In a month, will I remember this?”  

Man: “What will I feel then?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist reflects on his emotional turmoil and the desperation for connection amidst his impending fate.
